channel.title: Neighborhoods (Video Podcast)
channel.description: Behind every door is a story. Behind every story is a person. With every person there is an opportunity. Do you know your neighbors?
channel.itunes:subtitle: Every Neighbor Matters
channel.itunes:author: Oak Hills Church Community Life
channel.itunes:summary: Behind every door is a story. Behind every story is a person. With every person there is an opportunity. Do you know your neighbors?

item.description: A first hand perspective on taking the first step.

item.title: Resources & Tools
item.itunes:author: Oak Hills Church Community Life
item.itunes:subtitle: Session 4
item.itunes:summary: Explore the resources and tools Oak Hills has developed to help you be Jesus in your neighborhood.
item.description: Explore the resources and tools Oak Hills has developed to help you be Jesus in your neighborhood.

item.title: NNN Special Report: Begin with Prayer
item.itunes:author: Oak Hills Church Community Life
item.itunes:subtitle: Neighborhood Network News
item.itunes:summary: Les Newsman investigates reports of families praying together.
item.description: Les Newsman investigates reports of families praying together.

item.title: Story
item.itunes:author: Oak Hills Church Community Life
item.itunes:subtitle: BLESS Your Neighbors
item.itunes:summary: Share Commonalities: Create opportunities to share commonalities. Hobbies such as golf, book club, bunko night, or a running/fitness group can all bring people together. Socialize and Make Holidays Special: Enjoy your neighborhood recreational areas. Participate in yard sales and barbecues. Attend or host neighborhood holiday parties.
item.description: Share Commonalities: Create opportunities to share commonalities. Hobbies such as golf, book club, bunko night, or a running/fitness group can all bring people together. Socialize and Make Holidays Special: Enjoy your neighborhood recreational areas. Participate in yard sales and barbecues. Attend or host neighborhood holiday parties.

item.title: Serve
item.itunes:author: Oak Hills Church Community Life
item.itunes:subtitle: BLESS Your Neighbors
item.itunes:summary: Serve While You’re Outside: Turn lawn chores into opportunities to serve: Mow lawns, water yards, etc. Serve In Times of Need: Visit when a neighbor passes away or has a baby. Deliver flowers or a gift. Coordinate meals with other neighbors.
item.description: Serve While You’re Outside: Turn lawn chores into opportunities to serve: Mow lawns, water yards, etc. Serve In Times of Need: Visit when a neighbor passes away or has a baby. Deliver flowers or a gift. Coordinate meals with other neighbors.

item.title: Eat
item.itunes:author: Oak Hills Church Community Life
item.itunes:subtitle: BLESS Your Neighbors
item.itunes:summary: Enjoy a Meal Together: Invite a neighbor (or two) for a BBQ, order in Pizza, or have everyone bring a dessert to share. Celebrate Special Occasions and Holidays: Bake cupcakes for birthdays. Send a casserole to new parents. Deliver Christmas cookies.
item.description: Enjoy a Meal Together: Invite a neighbor (or two) for a BBQ, order in Pizza, or have everyone bring a dessert to share. Celebrate Special Occasions and Holidays: Bake cupcakes for birthdays. Send a casserole to new parents. Deliver Christmas cookies.

item.title: Listen
item.itunes:author: Oak Hills Church Community Life
item.itunes:subtitle: BLESS Your Neighbors
item.itunes:summary: Ask Open-ended Questions: How long have you lived in SA? What line of work are you in? What do you do for fun? Ask Follow-up Questions: How did that test go? Are you feeling better? How was your vacation?
item.description: Ask Open-ended Questions: How long have you lived in SA? What line of work are you in? What do you do for fun? Ask Follow-up Questions: How did that test go? Are you feeling better? How was your vacation?

item.title: Begin With Prayer
item.itunes:author: Oak Hills Church Community Life
item.itunes:subtitle: BLESS Your Neighbors
item.itunes:summary: Pray with your Family: Remember your neighbors by name during mealtime and bedtime prayers. Prayer Walk: Walk by yourself or with family, roommates, and other neighbors who are believers. Pray over each home by name as you pass and ask God for opportunities to get to know your neighbors.
item.description: Pray with your Family: Remember your neighbors by name during mealtime and bedtime prayers. Prayer Walk: Walk by yourself or with family, roommates, and other neighbors who are believers. Pray over each home by name as you pass and ask God for opportunities to get to know your neighbors.

item.title: BLESS Overview
item.itunes:author: Oak Hills Church Community Life
item.itunes:subtitle: BLESS Your Neighbors
item.itunes:summary: Just as God blessed Abraham and called him to be a blessing to to others, we too are called as followers of Christ to be a blessing to our neighbors.
item.description: Just as God blessed Abraham and called him to be a blessing to to others, we too are called as followers of Christ to be a blessing to our neighbors.
